Our passion
At our core, we have a passion to create a better world by making electronics more affordable through semiconductors. This passion is alive today as we continue to pioneer advances in integrated circuits. Each generation of innovation builds upon the last to make technology smaller, more efficient, more reliable and more affordable – opening new markets and making it possible for semiconductors to go into electronics everywhere. We think of this as Engineering Progress.

Browse by category
Why choose TI for your audio needs?
As a digital audio pioneer, our Burr-Brown™ audio portfolio builds on a foundation of sound quality and industry firsts.
Simplify designs with the Burr-Brown™ audio portfolio’s innovative architectures implemented in process technologies developed by our industry experts.
Provide a superior experience with Burr-Brown™ audio, the largest portfolio of high-fidelity audio devices, including high-performance Class-D amplifiers, op amps and data converters.
Explore audio technologies
Enable louder, cleaner sound without risking damage
Discover featured applications
Create high-fidelity audio for premium sound quality applications
Our technologies enable high-quality audio recording and playback, helping you create differentiated professional audio products.
Benefits:
- Our legacy Burr-Brown™ audio portfolio consists of innovative architectures implemented in cutting-edge process technologies developed by our industry experts.
- Our audio converters and amplifiers provide multichannel, high-resolution, low-distortion and wide-dynamic-range solutions for high-fidelity audio.
- Our high-efficiency speaker amplifiers with advanced speaker protection allow you to maximize power without damaging the speaker.
Create smarter building automation systems
Our analog amplifier and converter products help you increase energy efficiency in building automation applications.
Benefits:
- Our integrated solutions include multichannel audio converters and amplifiers to enable simplified designs.
- Our high-resolution, low-distortion, wide-dynamic-range data converters help produce high fidelity audio.
- Our high-efficiency speaker amplifiers with advanced speaker protection allow users to maximize power without damaging the speaker.
Implement codecs and amplifiers in radio and other ruggedized communication applications
Design smart avionics and defense electronics using our highly-integrated low-power codecs and efficient amplifiers.
Benefits:
- Our low-noise and low-distortion audio codecs increase sensitivity.
- Our integrated audio-processing products come in sizes that enable simplified designs.
- Our low electromagnetic interference solutions produce interference-free communication.
Build high-performance active noise cancellation systems with low latency to reduce unwanted noise in next-generation vehicles
Our scalable portfolio of audio converters and amplifiers offer high performance and integration, making it cost-effective to design best-in-class active noise cancellation (ANC) solutions.
Benefits of our analog-to-digital converters:
- Low-latency signal path.
- An integrated microphone bias voltage and diagnostics.
- Hardware- and software-compatible devices with two, four and six channel scalability.
Benefits of our Class-D audio amplifiers:
- Low-latency signal path.
- Digital or analog inputs.
- Sample rates as high as 192 kHz.
Increase integration and decrease the solution size of telematics control unit and emergency call designs.
Our scalable portfolio of audio converters and amplifiers feature high performance and integration, making it cost-effective to design best-in-class telematics and e-Call solutions for automotive.
Benefits of our codecs:
- Low latency signal path.
- Integrated microphone bias voltage and diagnostics.
- Large full-scale input voltage range.
Benefits of our Class-D audio amplifiers:
- Analog inputs.
- Load diagnostics.
- Pin-to-pin compatible 8- and 22-W options.
- Small, thermal pad down package.
Build a digital cockpit processing unit that meets the high performance and integration needs of our next-generation vehicles.
Our scalable portfolio of audio converters and amplifiers offer high performance and integration, making it cost-effective to design digital cockpit processing unit solutions.
Benefits of our analog-to-digital converters:
- Low-latency signal path.
- integrated microphone bias voltage and diagnostics.
- Hardware- and software-compatible devices with two, four and six channel scalability.
Benefits of our Class-D audio amplifiers:
- A broad portfolio including 2.1-MHz options.
- Low-latency signal path for time-critical audio signals.
- Sample rates as high as 192 kHz.

Our battery management solutions, tools and expertise make it easier for you to design more efficient, longer lasting and more reliable battery-powered applications. Our battery management portfolio includes chargers, gauges, monitors and protection ICs that can be used in industrial, automotive and personal electronic applications.
Browse by category
Technical resources
Discover featured applications
Create a safe, efficient and long-lasting battery system in medical applications with our battery management technology
Benefits:
- Gauges offer programmable hardware and firmware-based protections alongside high system-on-a-chip accuracy.
- Chargers support multicell configurations and parallel battery packs, and provide quick backup functionality for seamless transition during a main power failure.
- Protectors provide features for one-cell-in-series battery systems through voltage, current and temperature, using external power temperature coefficient protections in a cost-optimized solution. Extend product shelf life with our low-power consumption mode and improved thermal performance.
Increase functional-safety and run time in HEV and EV applications with our battery management technology
Benefits:
- Monitors provide ±1mV accuracy and synchronized readings of cell voltages and pack current.
- Gauges offer simple setup configuration and support multiple cell chemistries for easy integration into an e-call system.
Enable a long-lasting and quick-charging battery system in garden and power tool applications with our battery management technology
Benefits:
- Gauges have precise gauging algorithms to ensure the battery's exact state of charge. A chemistry-ID system enables shorter design cycles without sacrificing accuracy.
- Chargers support the entire USB Type-C® Power Delivery spectrum (20V, 5A) and multicell battery packs.
- Monitors offer high-accuracy voltage measurements (±5mV at 25°C) capable of autonomous or host-controlled cell balancing (through I2C, Serial Peripheral Interface or High-Speed Data Queue) for three to 16 cells in series.
- Protectors provide secondary redundant protections when leveraged with our monitors.
Quickly charge devices and prolong use with our battery management technology
Benefits:
- Gauges provide ±1mV gauging accuracy, while cell balancing maximizes battery life spans, enabling longer device use.
- Chargers provide charge current up to 8A with high efficiency using inductorless switch capacitor technology.
- Protectors boast a reduced feature size and power dissipation of approximately 4μA, suitable for small-form-factor products, while offering both primary and secondary protection options.
Create high-accuracy, protected battery systems in ESS applications with our battery management technology
Benefits:
- Monitors offer a reliable and stackable solution for small-scale residential energy storage systems (ESS) and up to grid-scale ESS with high-accuracy voltage measurements (±5mV) for high-voltage battery systems.
- Gauges provide high state-of-health accuracy for vital system reporting. They support multiple cell chemistries and provide end of service for rarely discharged devices.
- Chargers support up to 20A of charge current to quickly recharge backup batteries and handle up to 70V on the output for a wide variety of backup battery configurations.
Generate fast-charging, reliable and accurate battery systems in e-mobility applications with our battery management technology
Benefits:
- Gauges offer built-in authentication, preventing unofficial battery packs. A –40°C to 150°C operating temperature range ensures reliability in almost any environment.
- Chargers offer USB Type-C® Power Delivery Extended Power Range capability for up to 240W charging, support for batteries with 10 to 16 cells in series, and bidirectional power flow through (for example) an e-bike battery to charge personal electronics.
- Monitors and protectors for batteries with three to 16 cells in series can be leveraged for redundant protections to meet mobile application safety requirements.

Browse by category
Address your clock and timing system challenges
Reliability improvements that differ from traditional resonator technologies
Discover featured applications
Improve signal integrity and reduce total solution cost for next-generation 112-G and 224-G PAM4 SerDes clocking with ultra-low jitter clocks enabled by TI's BAW technology
TI's bulk acoustic wave (BAW) technology and broad clocking portfolio with excellent jitter performance enable TI to stand out as a leading clocks supplier.
- Ultra-low jitter (42-fs) clocks for 112G and 224G PAM-4 SerDes.
- Low-frequency XO, TCXO or OCXO, the elimination of an external low-dropout regulator requirement and an exceptional power-supply rejection ratio reduce total solution costs.
- IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol (PTP) synchronous Ethernet solution. Best-in-class jitter along with Class-D timing-accurate PTP software meets G8275.1 and G.8275.2 compliance.
Bulk acoustic wave-based network synchronizers, radio-frequency synthesizers and clock distribution have made TI clocking solutions popular in 4G and 5G networks, paving the way to 6G designs
Our network synchronizer's hitless switching and holdover performance help you design reliable systems, while our ultra-low-jitter clocks simplify 5G designs.
- Integrated LDOs provide a <–75-dBc power-supply rejection ratio on supply rails.
- DC coupling and easy interface with analog front ends, with JEDEC JESD204B and JESD204C support.
- Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers 1588v2 Precision Time Protocol software provides full timing support; 1-PPS signal deviation <±5 ns; and partial timing support less than ±1 µs, with packet delay variations in excess of 230 µs.
Maximize system reliability and performance in enterprise systems using multisource, high-performance Peripheral Component Interconnect Express (PCIe) Gen 1 through Gen 6 and Ethernet clocking devices
Our PCIe and Ethernet clocking portfolio includes bulk acoustic wave oscillators, fanout buffers, clock multiplexers and referenceless clock generators.
- Ultra-low jitter helps PCIe Gen 1 to Gen 6 compliance with greater noise margin.
- Low propagation delay enables multiple PCIe buffer cascading.
- Integrated LDO and a high peak signal-to-noise ratio simplify power-filtering circuits.
- Programmable output formats including low-power high speed current steering logic, low-voltage differential signaling, and 1.2- to 3.3-V low-voltage complementary metal-oxide semiconductor.
Meet precise synchronization requirements and deliver low-noise systems using our clocking and radio-frequency synthesizer solutions
Our clocking products and radio-frequency phase-locked loops (PLLs) enable ultra-low-noise performance and synchronization features.
- High-performance PLLs, an external voltage-controlled oscillator (VCO) mode and an external phase detector input mode help meet stringent noise requirements.
- Multicore VCOs and calibration algorithms enable wideband coverage and fast frequency hopping.
- Phase synchronization and adjustability and input windowing features simplify multigigahertz clock synchronization in Joint Electron Device Engineering Council JESD204B and JESD204C systems.
Perform in the harshest radiation environments using TI's radiation-tolerant and radiation-hardened clocking and RF synthesizer solutions
Our high-performance and feature-rich clocking products help you deliver high bandwidth, with wide radio-frequency (RF) coverage in harsh radiation environments.
- Highly integrated monolithic clock generators and RF synthesizers help reduce size, weight and power in spaceborne applications.
- Design practices and process characteristics enable consistent, predictable behavior in harsh radiation environments.
- Access to detailed radiation reports covering various device modes along with 60 years of expertise in space products helps reduce time to launch.
Unlock new levels of performance, speed and precision in your test equipment by choosing TI's clocking and RF synthesizer solutions
Our clocking products and radio-frequency (RF) phase-locked loops seamlessly reduce noise and design complexity, enabling applications from precision semiconductor and wireless communications testers to lab instruments.
- RF synthesizers equipped with calibration algorithms enable wideband frequency coverage and fast frequency hopping.
- Feature-rich products simplify phase synchronization for multichannel gigahertz sampling systems.
- Ultra-low-jitter clock buffers and clock generators enable high-speed interfaces from Peripheral Component Interconnect Express to Ethernet.

Understanding isolation technology
Discover featured applications
Maximize EV system reliability and safety, optimize cost and maintain power efficiency using silicon dioxide isolation technology.
Our SiO2 isolation technology helps optimize and protect automotive applications with solutions for traction inverters, DC/DC, and OBC. Design forward thinking topologies that increase efficiency and reliability, while achieving top of the line protection by our robust isolation technology.
- Basic and reinforced isolation in a variety of package options
- Extra-wide creepage and clearance packages offering highest working voltage
- AEC-Q100 Certifications
- High CMTI provides low voltage side protection from high switching transients
Isolate intelligent, flexible and efficient factory automation applications that save energy and extend system life.
Our SiO2 isolation technology has a rich history in factory automation applications, providing reliable data and power isolation in critical applications such as PLC, field transmitters, industrial robots, HMI and industrial PC.
- Basic and reinforced isolation in a variety of package options
- Isolated 24-V to 60-V digital input receivers, compliant to IEC 61131-2 Type 1, 2, and 3 characteristics
- IECEx and ATEX certifications
- Functional safety-capable
- Ultra-low power isolation
- 8kV ESD contact meets IEC 61000-4-2 Level 4 requirements
Increase power efficiency, optimize system cost and improve reliability using silicon dioxide isolation technology.
Our SiO2 isolation technology helps optimize solar inverter, eMeter, EV charging, and protection relay cost while enabling efficient power delivery and a smarter grid that meets global compliance standards for long-term reliability.
- Over 30 million hours of reliability testing proving better lifetime performance and ensuring reliable operation
- Extra-wide creepage and clearance packages offering highest working voltage
- 8kV ESD contact meets IEC 61000-4-2 Level 4 requirements
- Lowest emissions, integrated isolated power solutions to reduce board space and design complexity
Maximize motor and power efficiency, optimize system cost and improve reliability using silicon dioxide isolation technology.
Our SiO2 isolation technology provides motor drive applications with high reliability, long lifespan and superior isolation voltage ratings. TI isolation is a proven solution for AC drives, servo drives, CNC, robotics, drones, and e-bikes.
- Reinforced DIN VDE V 0884-11:2017-01 certification
- Over 30 million hours of reliability testing proving better lifetime performance and ensuring reliable operation
- Integrated interlock functionality for IPM applications
- Extra-wide creepage and clearance packages
- Functional safety-capable
- 8kV ESD contact meets IEC 61000-4-2 Level 4 requirements"
Maximize power efficiency, optimize system cost and improve reliability in next-generation appliances using silicon dioxide isolation technology.
Our SiO2 isolation technology helps optimize major appliances, air conditioners, robots and power tools reliability while reducing system cost and design complexity. Simplify motor control, interface signal isolation and power isolation with a large portfolio of isolation solutions.
- Basic and reinforced isolation in a variety of package options
- Ultra-low power isolation
- Over 30 million hours of reliability testing proving better lifetime performance and ensuring reliable operation
- Lowest emissions, integrated isolated power solutions to reduce board space and design complexity
Maximize system robustness and reliability while optimizing cost using silicon dioxide isolation technology.
Our SiO2 isolation technology enables medical applications with high reliability, long lifespan and superior isolation voltage ratings. Our isolation solutions are used in many types of medical end equipment such as patient monitors, defibrillators, electrocardiograms and surgical equipment.
- IEC 60601-1 certification
- Over 30 million hours of reliability testing proving better lifetime performance and ensuring reliable operation
- 8kV ESD contact meets IEC 61000-4-2 Level 4 requirements
- Lowest emissions, integrated isolated power solutions to reduce board space and design complexity

What makes our motor drivers different
Achieve the quietest and most efficient motion control. Reduce your time to market with advanced tuning technologies, sensorless control and system-level integration.
Get the most power in the smallest packages across all voltage and current options. Increase your design flexibility with our pin-to-pin multichannel options.
Boost system robustness with advanced features such as stall and open-load detection and power-off braking. Our quality drivers detect system faults and enable functional-safety system design.

Our passive and discrete components offer high performance in small package options for a range of applications. Devices include protection diodes, high-accuracy silicon-based linear thermistors, ultra-low-noise junction field-effect transistors, fixed-frequency oscillators and precision thin-film resistors. Our technological advancements help reliably protect your system, enhance design integration, and offer functionality and performance while reducing solution size and power.

Reliably protect your system from ESD and surge events

As your partner in power management, we are in constant pursuit of pushing the limits of power: developing new process, packaging and circuit-design technologies to deliver the best devices for your application. We’re committed to working alongside you to solve key power design challenges – increasing power density, extending battery life, reducing electromagnetic interference (EMI), enhancing power and signal integrity, and making systems even safer. It’s our mission to make more innovation possible for engineers everywhere.

Discover featured applications
Dominate the electromagnetic spectrum with products offering exceptional radio-frequency performance, a wide bandwidth, low latency, high integration and channel density, and synchronization.
For over six decades, we have created high-performance devices with extended reliability for the defense market. Our commitment to long-term product availability helps you maintain projects with extended lifetimes, while our system engineers support you with detailed reference designs, application examples and component recommendations to meet demanding requirements in your defense-related designs.
Deliver next-generation communication and imaging systems with low size, weight and power with our portfolio of radiation-hardened and radiation-tolerant RF components.
Our data converters, clocking products, amplifiers and system designs help you deliver the highest bandwidth with the widest radio-frequency (RF) coverage in harsh environments, as well as the ability to support multiple radar or communication channels with higher throughput in a smaller space.
Across mission requirements from low Earth orbit to deep space, a wider instantaneous bandwidth and broader RF coverage enable direct RF sampling. In phased-array systems, synchronizing a large number of channels is possible.
Enable high-performance, cost-optimized solutions with our portfolio of RF transceivers, designed with flexibility to accommodate a range of use cases.
Our analog front-ends with integrated digital predistortion technology enable you to develop next-generation high-power base stations for 5G and beyond. Our RF-sampling transceivers feature multiband capabilities for a range of wireless applications, while the small size of our integrated zero-intermediate-frequency transceivers help limit power consumption. Our products allow you to invest in higher channel counts while minimizing size.
TI’s high-speed, low-latency and wide-bandwidth ADCs, DACs, clocks and RF amplifiers help ensure exceptional signal integrity and performance.
With decades of innovation, we deliver high-performance solutions tailored for test and measurement applications. Our advanced analog-to-digital converters (ADCs), digital-to-analog-converters (DACs), clocks and RF amplifiers provide high speed, performance and reliability. Backed by long-term availability and expert support, our components empower you to build next-generation systems that push the boundaries of measurement accuracy and efficiency.

From self-driving cars to smart homes, systems are increasingly making decisions based on the world around them. Leverage our portfolio of highly accurate sensors with quick response times to capture the necessary information to enable real-time control and autonomy in a wide range of end equipment.

Our broad portfolio of switches and multiplexers enable power and signal chain system design for every application need. With the latest process technologies and package developments we offer a comprehensive selection of analog switches and multiplexers, buffered encoders and decoders, and power switches in the smallest solution sizes. Our analog switches and multiplexers help you improve system design with better accuracy, reliability and platform scalability, while maintaining signal integrity. Our power switches provide sequencing, protection against common IC events, diagnostic telemetry, and more is made possible with our power switches.

Why choose TI for wireless connectivity
Integrate wireless functionality through innovations such as protocol standardization, crystal-less MCUs and advanced security features.
Select from a broad and affordable portfolio of proven wireless radios for 2.4 GHz, Sub-1 GHz and Wi-Fi connectivity.
Let us guide your selection of the right wireless technology to fit your application with intuitive development tools and resources.
